Due to the high slowdown (10-100x) of `aprof/memcheck/callgrind` we can't run all the benchmarks with real workloads (`--size=ref`) provided by CPU SPEC2006. 

We run the benchmarks with:
{{{
runspec --config=ubuntu.cfg --noreportable --size=test --tune=base $name_bench 
}}}
You can find `ubuntu.cfg` file and all PDF reports here.

=== Platform ===
  * Macbook 5,1
  * Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo CPU     P7350  @ 2.00GHz
  * 2GB DDR3
  * Ubuntu 11.04 *32bit*
